title: Gorgeous 1x1 Unit available for Immediate move-in. Save $!!!
posting_body: ['Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes', '3825 Craig Crossing Dr., North Las Vegas, NV, 89032', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'WELCOME HOME!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 780 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes!', "Perfectly situated in the heart of Las Vegas, Nevada you'll be proud to call Tribeca North Luxury Apartments your home.", 'Our residents appreciate the easy access to freeways, local restaurants, shopping centers and entertainment, and we are conveniently located minutes from downtown.', 'Stylish apartments await you at Tribeca North Luxury Apartment Homes.', 'Our spacious floor plans were designed with your comfort and convenience in mind, offering amenities that are second to none!', 'Choose from our unique one, two and three bedroom floor plans that come with well-appointed amenities.', "You'll be thrilled at where you live!", 'Features', '- Pre-Wired For High-Speed Internet and Cable TV', '- Triple Bay Windows', '- Custom Interior Two-Toned Paint', '- Sleek Black on Black GE Appliances', '- Intrusion Alarm Systems', 'In All Homes', '- Multiple Ceiling Fans with Lights', '- Additional Phone Lines Available', '- Designer Lighting Packages', '- Ceramic Tile in Entry, Kitchen, and Bathrooms', 'Community Amenities', '- Wi-Fi Internet Access Available at Pool and Clubhouse', "- Children's Playground", '- Spectacular Mountain and Pool Views', '- Remote Controlled Access Gates', '- Outdoor Living Lounge With Ramadas and Barbeque', '- Planned Resident Activities', "- Children's Splash Pad", '- Professional On Site Management Staff', '- Outdoor Recreation Center', '- Business Center', '- 24-Hour On Call Maintenance', '- Resort-Style Pool, Lap Pool and Oversized Spa', '- Two Athletic Centers With Cardio Center and Free Weights', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Upon Approval.', 'There is a $350 non-refundable pet deposit, $40 monthly pet rent as well.', 'The pet limit is two pets per unit.', 'Please call for more details.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'CQEw98VGuUw']
